content: Hi Shaunta, you are so generous with your tips and somehow your writing causes me to act; I am already trying to write 10 mins a day and I just used the headliner analyser. It is indeed liberating what you write so thanks fo another tip. You will see that I had orginally exiting stage right , scored a 12 the new title scored a 71!! best g. https://medium.com/@gordiejackson/exiting-stage-right-cabb74f4f03b
